price: Watasema: Tulikaa siku moja au sehemu ya siku. Basi waulize wanao weka hisabu.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ
footnotes: Watasema kwa kuyaona mafupi maisha yao kwa adhabu wanayo ikuta: Tuliishi muda wa siku moja au baadhi ya siku hivi. Basi waulize wanao weza kuhisabu, sisi tumeshughulishwa na hii adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū labith'nā yawman aw baʿḍa yawmin fasali al-ʿādīna
